Package com.valmet.watermark.service.impl

Class AuthServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.valmet.watermark.service.impl.AuthServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthService
@Service public class AuthServiceImpl extends Object implements AuthService
Implementation of the AuthService interface responsible for handling authentication and token management.

This class provides functionality for:

  • Authenticating users and generating JWT access and refresh tokens.
  • Validating and renewing refresh tokens.
Version:
1.0
Author:
BJIT

      Constructor to initialize dependencies.
      Parameters:
      tokenService - the service used for JWT token generation and validation
      watermarkSecretsManager - the secrets manager for retrieving valid credentials
      jwtSettings - the JWT settings, including expiration times for tokens

  • Method Details

    • authenticate

      public AuthenticationResponseDTO authenticate(JwtTokenRequest request) throws IOException
      Authenticates a user based on the provided credentials and generates JWT tokens.
      Specified by:
      authenticate in interface AuthService
      Parameters:
      request - the authentication request containing username and password
      Returns:
      an AuthenticationResponseDTO containing the access token and refresh token
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during authentication
      WatermarkApplicationException - if the username or password is invalid

    • renewToken

      public AuthenticationResponseDTO renewToken(RefreshTokenRequest refreshTokenRequest) throws Exception
      Renews the access token using a valid refresh token.
      Specified by:
      renewToken in interface AuthService
      Parameters:
      refreshTokenRequest - the request containing the refresh token
      Returns:
      an AuthenticationResponseDTO containing the new access token and the existing refresh token
      Throws:
      Exception
